meeting_info.organization: City of Dallas Public Facility Corporation
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Auditorium L1FN and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the minutes of August 27, 2024, Board Meeting

agenda_items.title: Ethics Disclosures
agenda_items.description: Board members should disclose any relationship a member may have with the projects to be considered on this agenda.

agenda_items.title: Demolition Discussion
agenda_items.description: Discussion regarding the demolition of the facility at 9999 Technology Blvd and Resolution authorizing the Park at Northpoint Apartments transaction.

agenda_items.title: Burnett Lofts Resolution
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution authorizing the negotiation and execution of a Term Sheet for the Burnett Lofts.
agenda_items.presenter: Sam McDaniel; Jim Plummer; Braxton Parsons

agenda_items.title: Creation of Subcommittee
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the creation of a subcommittee with the purpose of hiring staff.

agenda_items.title: Ethics Presentation
agenda_items.description: Presentation regarding board and commission ethics regulations.

agenda_items.title: DPFC Bylaws Changes
agenda_items.description: Discussion regarding proposed changes to the DPFC Bylaws.

agenda_items.title: Dallas PFC Website Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion and review of Dallas PFC Website Report.

agenda_items.title: Texas Public Information Act Training
agenda_items.description: Discussion regarding Texas Attorney General Texas Public Information Act and Open Meetings Act online training.

agenda_items.title: Dallas PFC Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion and review of Dallas PFC Pipeline Report.
